Name: Simple Softly
Ingredients: 5 ml Mancino Vermouth di Torino Chinato
Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Beer
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Top with ginger beer.
Review: Cognac, gin and bourbon come together in this tall refreshing ginger beer topped cocktail.
History: Created in 2015 by Daniel Lansbergen, Behind Bars, Utrecht, The Netherlands.
Nutrition: One serving of Simple Softly contains 150 calories
Garnish: Mint, ginger slices & dehydrated lime wheel
